name: Dream Cafe-Match 3 Crush
description:
Welcome to Dream Cafe! Let's make Maria's dream come true. The story begins when you enter the restaurant!

Clear ingredients by matching at least 3 of them. Collect stars to renovate your restaurant. The exciting story will lead you to success! What are you waiting for?

FEATURES:
Fun gameplays: collect stars by clearing ingredients, then use them to decorate your restaurant.
Decoration: decide how you want your restaurant to look like!
Exciting Match-3 puzzle game: use items to help you clear faster!
Variety: slowly explore every nook and cranny of your restaurant.
Amazing characters: see how the dramatic story plays out.
Invite your Facebook friends to help you! Interact with them through the social function of the game!
Free to download and play!
Playable without a network connection.

How to Play:
Swap 2 adjacent ingredients to match 3 identical ones and clear them.
Unlock boosters like bombs and rainbow gems to help you clear the levels.
Complete objectives to decorate your restaurants.
Clear levels with fewer moves to earn more coins!

Download Dream Cafe now to start your magical journey today!
Keep an eye out for new updates and levels!
Report bugs and provide feedback to collect gifts!
https://www.facebook.com/dreamcafe.puzzlegames
Happy gaming!

Note：Requires iPhone 6 or later.
